root.class_name: GSCTask Play Montage Wait for Event
root.shorttitle: Play Montage and Wait for Event
root.fulltitle: Play Montage and Wait for Event
root.description:
Play a montage and wait for it end. If a gameplay event happens that matches EventTags (or EventTags is empty), the EventReceived delegate will fire with a tag and event data.
If StopWhenAbilityEnds is true, this montage will be aborted if the ability ends normally. It is always stopped when the ability is explicitly cancelled.
On normal execution, OnBlendOut is called when the montage is blending out, and OnCompleted when it is completely done playing OnInterrupted is called if another montage overwrites this, and OnCancelled is called if the ability or task is cancelled

param.name: Task Instance Name
param.description: Set to override the name of this task, for later querying

param.name: Montage to Play
param.description: The montage to play on the character

param.name: Event Tags
param.description: Any gameplay events matching this tag will activate the EventReceived callback. If empty, all events will trigger callback

param.name: Rate
param.description: Change to play the montage faster or slower

param.name: Start Section
param.description: Change to montage section to play during montage

param.name: Stop when Ability Ends
param.description: If true, this montage will be aborted if the ability ends normally. It is always stopped when the ability is explicitly cancelled

param.name: Anim Root Motion Translation Scale
param.description: Change to modify size of root motion or set to 0 to block it entirely

param.name: Async Task
param.type: GSCTask Play Montage Wait For Event Object Reference
